title: Two Weeks with iPhone Xs! Beauty Gate! Charge Gate?!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine! As you know, I'm a huge Apple fan and many of you guys have been like Justine, talk about the gates, talk about beauty-gate, talk about charge-gate. Uh, I'm gonna talk about it, I'm not sure what you want me to say about it other than my front facing camera makes me look beautiful, and I don't have a problem with charge-gate. My phone charges perfectly fine. Now I'm not saying that these aren't issues. What, at least my phone isn't exploding or catching on fire, that's all I'm saying. Crossing our fingers that that doesn't happen to anybody no matter what type of phone you're using. Anyway, it's been about two weeks since I got my phone and I still love it. I also am a huge Samsung fan, I love my Google Pixel. I love phones, I love technology, and I tend to gravitate towards Apple. I am a big iPhone fan, but that's not to say that I don't enjoy other phones. I like Android. I prefer iOS, and guess what? So do a lot of other people. The thing is, Android is on so many phones that it's kinda hard to get one sort of experience on it whereas iOS is only on one device, so. I don't even know where I'm going with this. I just like trying to get all the Android fanboys all fired up and angry, and leaving angry comments because I think it's funny actually, the fighting in the comments that happens about Mac versus PC versus Android versus iOS. People can use whatever they want, it's not really that big of a deal. There are preferences. If everyone liked the same thing, this world would be incredibly boring. So a few weeks ago, I also filmed a photo test video and a video test video, which I never even ended up posting. I got so overwhelmed shooting so many iPhone videos that by the time it came to start editing the photo and video review video with the iPhone X, the iPhone XS Max, and the Note9, I was like I can't do this right now, so I just didn't. And I figured that I would take some of that footage and content and put it into another video, so that's the video that you guys are watching right now. So I'm not sure if it's safe to say that beauty-gate is a filter, because I don't think anyone has really come out with what exactly it is. I read a few articles. There's one that it saying that it's the noise reduction, but when I initially took that photo, I was kinda thinking it was the smart HDR because basically what it felt it was doing was it was pulling out all of the shadow, so it was kinda just making a very evenly lit photo. Okay I wanna show you a difference between selfies. - Oh, you look bad there! - Hey, that's my face! - [Jenna] You look beautiful there! - Well no, 'cause the super HDR - No, the lighting. - 'Cause it brings out the contrasts and everything. - Wow. - Like look at that. - [Jenna] That looks really good. - Right? - [Jenna] Wow. - I'm impressed. - [Jenna] I'm very impressed. - [Justine] Me, too, very neat. - [Jenna] Yeah, it looks great. - Which one looks like more in person? Don't answer the question! Do you guys wanna go to Buca di Beppo tonight? - [Jenna] Oh my God. (laughing) - Would someone please go to Buca di Beppo with me? So I don't think that I need to justify my issues. Do I? I've definitely noticed that my battery life has been a lot better.
